org.spf4j.unix

Class JVMArguments

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.spf4j.unix.JVMArguments

  • public final class JVMArguments
extends Object
    List of arguments for Java VM and application. based on class from akuma lib (http://akuma.kohsuke.org).

        @Nullable
public String removeSystemProperty(String pname)
        Removes the first System property.
        Parameters:
        pname - the name of the system property to remove.
        Returns:
        the value of the removed system property. or null if there is no such property.
